properties.name: input_ao_system_name
properties.description: name of the AO system you are using
This workflow publishes metrics to influxDB but could be updated to whatever DB or system you like.

actions.name: Group
actions.title: Publish Stats to Influx via API

properties.display_name: Publish Stats to Influx via API

properties.name: AO.General.Hourly.Engineer.Rate.in.USD
properties.description: rate you would pay an engineer to do the same work AO will automate

properties.name: Influx.Precision
properties.description: precision of the input to DB. Defaults to "s" or seconds.

properties.name: Influx.measurements_json
properties.description: Measurements JSON that can include multiple measurements, tags, fields. See default example. Can take in single measurement or array of measurements via JSON. Default example is an array of measurements.

This workflow takes in measurements via JSON construct and formats them for InfluxDB API calls. 
If you need strings in field keys, make sure to add type to it, like example. test
SOURCE SYSTEM: CX-AO-DEV-02
